00039 
00040 void Segment_EF_axi::normale(int num_Face,DoubleTab& Face_normales,
00041                              const  IntTab& Face_sommets,
00042                              const IntTab& Face_voisins,
00043                              const IntTab& elem_faces,
00044                              const Zone& zone_geom) const
00045 {
00046   Segment_EF::normale(num_Face,Face_normales,Face_sommets,Face_voisins,elem_faces,zone_geom);
00047 
00048   const DoubleTab& les_coords = zone_geom.domaine().coord_sommets();
00049   const DomaineAxi1d& domax = ref_cast(DomaineAxi1d,zone_geom.domaine());
00050   int elem = Face_voisins(num_Face,0)==-1 ? Face_voisins(num_Face,1) : Face_voisins(num_Face,0);
00051 
00052   double x0 = domax.origine_repere(elem,0);
00053   double y0 = domax.origine_repere(elem,1);
00054 
00055   int som = Face_sommets(num_Face,0);
00056   double x = les_coords(som,0);
00057   double y = les_coords(som,1);
00058 
00059   double r = sqrt((x-x0)*(x-x0)+(y-y0)*(y-y0));
00060   double surf = 2.*M_PI*r;
00061   if (surf>0.)
00062     Face_normales(num_Face,0)*=surf;
00063 }
